channel.title: Overpower Ranged

item.title: Overpower Ranged
item.dc:creator: @Caldito_Master Caldito Master
item.description:
@Caldito_Master wrote:

Well hello again I need help to take off the overpower ranged (hiting 160 to npcs and vs player max 63(thatâ€™s good))
Source : MithScape (Whiz i think) paladino76 base or what ever is called, I found the code for ranged vs npc (i guess) please say to me if its correct, if not please help me locate it. Thanks

if (usingRange()) { if (Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, n.absX, n.absY) > 7) return; if (!p.correctDistance(npcSize, npcCoord, n.absX, n.absY, 7)) { byte0 = 70; Server.engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue(p); } } else { if (n.npcType == 1158 || n.npcType == 1160 || n.npcType == 6203 || n.npcType == 6260) { if (!p.correctDistance(npcSize, npcCoord, n.absX, n.absY, 1)) { byte0 = 70; Server.engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue(p); } } else { if (Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, n.absX, n.absY) > 1) { return; } }

Read full topic
